name: Yukari's Wondrous Icy Patterns
description:
UPDATE: Added a Post Jam Version 1.1. Comes with a new main menu and in game frame UI to better separate from previous assets. Adjusted the music such that there is now an intro music sequence. The track loop is now smoother and more of the track is able to be heard. 

Game Jam entry with the intent to learn the Danmokou Bullet Hell Engine. Take on Yukari's wintery themed patterns that she made up in a weekend. There will be some balance issues forewarned.

Instructions

Ensure V-Sync is set to Off, or else the FPS will sky rocket beyond 60. If the fps is still above 60 fps try to set V-Sync to off and restart the program.

Controls

You have 8 lives to start and 40+ continues!

Arrow Keys 

Left Shift - Focused Mode, move more carefully

Z - Shoot

X - Slow down mode, slow down time around you to dodge easier

Credit to Danmokou and Daboum for the help

https://dmk.bagoum.com/docs/index.html

Track used is from YuzuSound Complete

https://note.com/lilysan_suwa/n/n93d7049bbdc6#bRJ55
